reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and well-made, with one noting it hits below the knees without heels. The style receives positive feedback, with one customer particularly appreciating the skirt flare, and the color is lovely. The material quality and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some find the material nice, others say it's of lower quality, and while some say the size is right on, others mention it's not true to size. The flattering aspect also gets mixed reactions, with some finding it flattering while others say it's not as expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WHITE PLEATED DRESS
items.body: I don't know how ppl wrote bad reviews abt this dress. I am size 12 5ft 4 weighs 186lbs i bought XL and it fits perfectly. I ordered late Saturday evening and received it Sunday at 2p. I wore it at 6p to a church service. It needed ironing on the sleeve, top and dress hem. I used a warm iron and it did the job. I got many compliments, it felt real comfortable and looked great with hot pink handbag & pink shoes. It is beautiful Read more
items.author: Laverne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: This dress is beautiful and fit perfectly! It is very flattering, true to size and excellentquality. It took a little work to get the wrinkles out but no complaints. Read more
items.author: Customer 260

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Autumn Elegance with a Flirty Twist!
items.body: The PRETTYGARDEN Women's Fall Midi Dress is a delightful addition to the autumn wardrobe. The long puff sleeves and wrap V-neck create a flattering silhouette, just know that the chest portion of the dress is loser and roomy, while the flowy ruffle pleats add a romantic and feminine charm. The fabric feels light and comfortable, making it perfect for transitional weather. It's versatile enough for both a casual day out or a semi-formal event. If only the fabric were a bit more wrinkle-resistant, it would be the ultimate go-to dress. Nonetheless, it's a stylish, well-made piece that exudes effortless elegance. Great buy! Read more
items.author: Victoria Batiste

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is off- but dress is beautiful
items.body: I wear a 16/18 with a 42D bra. I ordered a xxl (20-22). There is no way this is a 20-22. The chest area was so tight. The xxl fits like a L/XL. This dress is beautiful and well made. It fit well in the waist. So bummed the chest was too small Read more
items.author: shortstack

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flowy and pleated
items.body: This is my go to dress whenever I go to church. The style is flatter and fits nicely. I did make an alteration of the chest area but overall feels nice. The material thickness is less than what I expected but the weight is very flowy. Read more
items.author: Abigail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: It didn‚Äôt fit but it was as advertised, I normally wear a 2XL but this fabric was not very forgiving and was too tight in the back area. I missed the return window so hoping I can wear it if I lose some weight. It is very pretty. Read more
items.author: Angelia Espinoza

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Honestly Just Bad
items.body: The sizing was very accurate! I suggest that if you're taller you size up, or the sleeves will almost be too short. The elastic around the wrists felt cheap and scratchy. The fabric was also of lower quality and noisy, especially the lining to the skirt. However the color is pretty accurate compared to the picture (though appearance of the color varies from screen to screen). There is, however, a little snap at the neckline of the dress to keep the girls mostly hidden. I'm sure this would be a different for larger bust measurements. Overall, the dress was just a bad experience. Read more
items.author: Brianna

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay but I don't like
items.body: Designed for skiny people. Waist is too tight. I can fit many of the Medium sized dress but not this one. Material is not to my like either Read more
items.author: Regina Alcantar

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cyan, Blue, Apricot, Black, Orange, Brick Red, Dark Green, Red, Rose Red, Bright Blue, Navy, Pink, White, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
